description:
While Akari hacks central command, the others steal a large shuttlecraft from Sydney base.  The three of them escape Australia, but the Ark Faction`s ultimate weapon, the Saramar Engine, chases after them.  Just when it seems like it`s all over, the Blume appears from the sea.  Hana returns to the Blume, believing that Daichi will come to her.  She is an artificial life form created to fire the Livlaster.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ima wa Hohoemu Kimi Da kara
